name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目誕生日2025】うれしい告知あり！ゲストあり！理想のライブはここにある【ホロライブ⧸ときのそら】 [IZDRnl38gvY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs 'Kagiri naku Haiiro e' (限りなく灰色へ) on stage.
Tokino Sora takes an MC break, thanks the audience, and introduces the next guest, Fuji Aoi.
Tokino Sora and guest Fuji Aoi perform 'Rinne Rondo' (輪廻ロンド) together.

subtitles.original: ...ちて
subtitles.english: ...and fall,

subtitles.original: 孤独を奏でる
subtitles.english: playing my loneliness.

subtitles.original: 指先から
subtitles.english: From my fingertips,

subtitles.original: 伝わってく
subtitles.english: it's being transmitted,

subtitles.original: 虚ろな色
subtitles.english: this hollow color.

subtitles.original: 認めてはくれないの？
subtitles.english: Won't you acknowledge me?

subtitles.original: 燻んでしまったの灰色に
subtitles.english: I've become dull and turned grey.

subtitles.original: こんな才能なんて借り物
subtitles.english: This kind of talent is just borrowed.

subtitles.original: まだ人生終わってないから
subtitles.english: Because my life isn't over yet.

subtitles.original: 「諦めるな」って誰かの声
subtitles.english: A voice says, "Don't give up."

subtitles.original: 見失ってしまったの灰色に
subtitles.english: I've lost sight of it in the grey.

subtitles.original: 気付けなくて今も抗ってる
subtitles.english: I didn't realize it, so I'm still resisting.

subtitles.original: この感情奪って去ってよ
subtitles.english: Take this emotion and leave.

subtitles.original: ドロドロになってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before everything turns into a mess.

subtitles.original: 私だけ見て愛を伝えて
subtitles.english: Look only at me and convey your love.

subtitles.original: こんな世界とバイバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Say bye-bye to this kind of world.

subtitles.original: 滲む思いなぞって描いた
subtitles.english: I traced my blurred thoughts and drew them.

subtitles.original: 夢の形に泣いちゃった
subtitles.english: I ended up crying at the shape of my dreams.

subtitles.original: いつかできると思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought I could do it someday.

subtitles.original: だけど現実は残酷だろ
subtitles.english: But reality is cruel, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 焦りと不安の渦の間に
subtitles.english: Between the vortex of impatience and anxiety,

subtitles.original: 黒くなって浮かんでる
subtitles.english: I'm floating, turning black.

subtitles.original: 退廃的なセンスと
subtitles.english: With a decadent sense and

subtitles.original: 曖昧な表現なんかじゃ
subtitles.english: ambiguous expressions,

subtitles.original: 奇を衒った奴らのアリスに
subtitles.english: I'll be swallowed by the eccentricity

subtitles.original: 飲み込まれて消えていく
subtitles.english: of those others and disappear.

subtitles.original: Rainy Rainy あれば流れていく徒花
subtitles.english: Rainy, rainy, fleeting flowers flowing away.

subtitles.original: 肩を濡らして残った
subtitles.english: Wetting my shoulders, what remains

subtitles.original: 冷たい記憶の体温
subtitles.english: is the temperature of cold memories.

subtitles.original: Rainy Rainy 雲の隙間から覗いた
subtitles.english: Rainy, rainy, I peered through the gaps in the clouds.

subtitles.original: 光当たって届いて
subtitles.english: The light hit me and reached me,

subtitles.original: 体を軽くしたんだ
subtitles.english: making my body feel lighter.

subtitles.original: 美学とか
subtitles.english: Aesthetics or

subtitles.original: プライドとか
subtitles.english: pride,

subtitles.original: 語る前に
subtitles.english: before talking about them,

subtitles.original: やれることやっていけ
subtitles.english: just do what you can.

subtitles.original: 尖ってしまったの灰色に
subtitles.english: I've become sharp and turned grey.

subtitles.original: 焼けた才能を一つ置いてけ
subtitles.english: Leave behind one burnt talent.

subtitles.original: ただやったもん勝ちなんでしょう
subtitles.english: It's just a matter of who does it first, right?

subtitles.original: 片腹痛い場合じゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: This is no time for ridiculous excuses.

subtitles.original: 目を開いてまだ変わらぬ灰色に
subtitles.english: Open your eyes to the still unchanging grey.

subtitles.original: 気付いたってどうしようもないから
subtitles.english: Even if I realize it, there's nothing I can do.

subtitles.original: それを越したんだと狙ってる
subtitles.english: I'm aiming to surpass that.

subtitles.original: ペルソナになって越されんなよ
subtitles.english: Become a persona and don't let them pass you.

subtitles.original: 私だけ見て愛を伝えて
subtitles.english: Look only at me and convey your love.

subtitles.original: こんな世界とバイバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Say bye-bye to this kind of world.

subtitles.original: 滲む思いなぞって描いた
subtitles.english: I traced my blurred thoughts and drew them.

subtitles.original: 言の葉の意味飲み込んで
subtitles.english: Swallowing the meaning of those words.

subtitles.original: 燻んでしまったの灰色に
subtitles.english: I've become dull and turned grey.

subtitles.original: こんな才能なんて借り物
subtitles.english: This kind of talent is just borrowed.

subtitles.original: まだ人生終わってないから
subtitles.english: Because my life isn't over yet.

subtitles.original: 「諦めるな」って誰かの声
subtitles.english: A voice says, "Don't give up."

subtitles.original: 見失ってしまったの灰色に
subtitles.english: I've lost sight of it in the grey.

subtitles.original: 気付けなくて今も抗ってる
subtitles.english: I didn't realize it, so I'm still resisting.

subtitles.original: この感情奪って去ってよ
subtitles.english: Take this emotion and leave.

subtitles.original: ドロドロになってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before everything turns into a mess.

subtitles.original: 私だけ見て愛を伝えて
subtitles.english: Look only at me and convey your love.

subtitles.original: こんな世界とバイバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Say bye-bye to this kind of world.

subtitles.original: 滲む思いなぞって描いた
subtitles.english: I traced my blurred thoughts and drew them.

subtitles.original: 夢の形笑っていた
subtitles.english: I was smiling at the shape of my dreams.

subtitles.original: はい、皆さんありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: 1回1回お水を飲まないと、息が切れてしまいますな。
subtitles.english: I have to drink water after every song or I'll run out of breath.

subtitles.original: いや、あにゃいじゃない...
subtitles.english: No, it's not "Anyai"...

subtitles.original: 反応してしまった。「はーい」って。
subtitles.english: I ended up responding with a "Yes!".

subtitles.original: いやぁ、というわけで、ゲストまだまだ見たいよね？
subtitles.english: Well, you still want to see more guests, right?

subtitles.original: ということで、どんどん行っちゃいましょうか。
subtitles.english: So, let's keep things moving.

subtitles.original: 続いてのゲストはこの人です！
subtitles.english: The next guest is this person!

subtitles.original: GUEST 富士葵
subtitles.english: GUEST Fuji Aoi

subtitles.original: 白い薔薇の花びら 1つ2つ開けば
subtitles.english: As one or two white rose petals open,

subtitles.original: あの日の記憶 蘇るでしょう
subtitles.english: the memories of that day will surely be revived.

subtitles.original: 安らぎに照らされて 花を咲かせた夜は
subtitles.english: Illuminated by peace, on nights when the flowers bloomed,

subtitles.original: 甘く切なく 色付いてゆく
subtitles.english: they sweeten and sadden, gaining their colors.
